LanguageData.Chemfuel.label: Ethanol Fuel
LanguageData.Chemfuel.description: A can of Ethanol Fuel produced from Wheat, Corn or Rice at a Brewery. It can be used to fuel the Steam Generator. Also can be used to fuel rockets and other machines。
LanguageData.BioDiesel.label: 生物柴油
LanguageData.BioDiesel.description: A can of BioDiesel Fuel produced from Bean Pods at a BioRefinery. It can be used to fuel the BioGenerator. Also can be used to fuel rockets and other machines。
LanguageData.Powder.label: 枪药
LanguageData.Powder.description: Gunpowder, also known as black powder, is the earliest known chemical explosive. It is a mixture of Sulfur, Coal Ore and Nitre. The Sulfur and Coal Ore act as fuels, and the Nitre is an oxidizer。
LanguageData.Napalm.label: 凝固汽油
LanguageData.Napalm.description: Napalm is flammable liquid used in warfare. It is a mixture of a gelling agent and petroleum or a similar fuel。
LanguageData.Fuel.label: 燃料油
LanguageData.Fuel.description: A type of fuel created from refined Crude Oil. It is needed to power the Fuel Power Plant Also can be used to fuel rockets and other machines.。
LanguageData.Prometheum.label: 普罗米修姆（燃剂）
LanguageData.Prometheum.description: Military-grade incendiary agent, ignites on contact with oxygen. The raw resource is used to craft incendiary ammo of all kinds。
LanguageData.FSX.label: FSX（燃剂）
LanguageData.FSX.description: High-explosive chemical extracted from Boomalope sacks, it is used in a variety of industrial and military applications。
